animal.question: I have a long trunk and big ears. I love to eat peanuts. Who am I?

hints.text: 🐘 I'm a very large animal!
🥜 I like to eat peanuts at the zoo.
💧 I use my trunk to spray water.

animal.question: I say 'Meow' and love to chase mice. I purr when you pet me. Who am I?

hints.text: 🐈 I like to drink milk.
🧶 I like to play with yarn.
🐭 I sometimes chase mice.

animal.question: I bark and wag my tail. I love to play fetch. Who am I?

hints.text: 🦴 I love to chew on bones.
🎾 I like to play in the park.
🏡 I live with a human family.

animal.question: I have a long neck and spots. I eat leaves from tall trees. Who am I?

hints.text: 🦒 I am the tallest animal.
🌿 I like to eat leaves.
🌍 I live in Africa.

animal.question: I say 'Oink' and love to roll in mud. What am I?

hints.text: 🐷 I live on a farm
🌱 I like to eat plants
🌧️ I like to play in puddles.

animal.question: I quack and swim in the pond. What am I?

hints.text: 🦆 I have webbed feet.
🥚 I hatch from an egg.
🍞 People often feed me bread.

animal.question: I have black and white stripes. I look a bit like a horse. Who am I?

hints.text: 🦓 I live in Africa.
🐾 My stripes help me blend in.
🐎 I am related to horses.

animal.question: I have a big mane and roar loudly. I am the king of the jungle. Who am I?

hints.text: 🦁 I am a very powerful cat.
👑 I am often called the king of the jungle.
🥩 I like to eat meat.

animal.question: I hop and have big ears. I love to eat carrots. Who am I?

hints.text: 🐇 I have long ears.
🥕 I like to eat carrots.
🌱 I can be found in gardens.

animal.question: I am big and fluffy and eat bamboo. I'm black and white. Who am I?

hints.text: 🐼 I live in China.
🥢 I eat a lot of bamboo.
⚫⚪ I am black and white.

cosmos.question: I am big and bright, and I come out during the day. What am I?

hints.text: 🔥 I give you warmth.
🌞 I help flowers grow.
👀 You shouldn't stare directly at me.

cosmos.question: I am round and spin around the sun. I am where you live. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 I have lots of water.
🌱 I have trees and plants.
🏡 People build houses on me.

cosmos.question: I shine at night and change my shape. Sometimes I'm round, sometimes I'm a sliver. What am I?

hints.text: 🌕 I orbit the Earth.
🐺 Some people howl at me.
🧀 Some people think I'm made of cheese.

cosmos.question: I am a big ball of gas that is far, far away, and shines with my own light. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I twinkle in the night sky.
🔭 You need a telescope to see me well.
🌌 The sun is one, but much closer!

cosmos.question: I am a group of stars that make a picture in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🐻 One is shaped like a bear.
🌠 People used to use me to navigate.
✨ You can see lots of me on a dark night.

cosmos.question: I am a red planet, and sometimes people send robots to explore me. What am I?

hints.text: 🚀 People want to visit me one day.
🏜️ I am dusty and dry.
🍫 I am named after a Roman god of war.

cosmos.question: I am a big, swirling group of stars, gas, and dust. Our sun lives in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌀 I am shaped like a spiral or an oval.
🌑 I can contain billions of stars.
✨ Our solar system is in the Milky Way.

cosmos.question: I am a giant planet with beautiful rings around me. What am I?

hints.text: 🪐 My rings are made of ice and rock.
💨 I am a gas giant.
🔭 You can easily see my rings with a telescope.

cosmos.question: I am a rock that flies through space. Sometimes I fall to Earth. What am I called when I hit the ground?

hints.text: ☄️ A bright streak of light signals I am coming.
💥 I can create a crater.
🌑 Scientists study me to learn about space.

cosmos.question: I am a very big cloud of gas and dust in space where stars are born. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I can be very colorful.
✨ New stars form inside of me.
🔭 Telescopes help us see how beautiful I am.
